explains: n. 就职典礼；开幕式；开创
wordGroup: inauguration day n. 美国总统就职日

sentences.en: They later attended the inauguration of the University.
sentences.cn: 他们后来参加了该大学的成立典礼。

sentences.en: The inauguration was a big event.
Barack and Michelle Obama at an inauguration ball.
sentences.cn: 巴拉克·奥巴马和米歇尔·奥巴马在就职大厅。
